remarks: Lemma for ~ dvgt0 and ~ dvlt0 .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Feb-2015.)
statement:
dvgt0.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
dvgt0.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
dvgt0.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( ( A [,] B ) -cn-> RR ) ) $.
dvgt0lem.d $e |- ( ph -> ( RR _D F ) : ( A (,) B ) --> S ) $.
dvgt0lem1 $p |- ( ( ( ph /\ ( X e. ( A [,] B ) /\ Y e. ( A [,] B ) ) ) /\ X < Y ) -> ( ( ( F ` Y ) - ( F ` X ) ) / ( Y - X ) ) e. S ) $.
